name: Breathe (itch) (NYU Game Center - High School Programs)
name_original: Breathe (itch) (NYU Game Center - High School Programs)
description:
By Nil C. and KK L.

Your every move will emit sounds. The monster will hear you if you emit too much sound... Keep pressing space to hold your breath while walking to get away from the monster!  IF YOU HOLD YOUR BREATH FOR TOO LONG YOU WILL BE NOTICED AND... BAD THINGS WILL HAPPEN. 

Controls:  Arrow keys to walk, and hold shift to run. Press E to pick up keys, keep pressing space to hold your breath. Get 3 keys to the gate to escape!
developers: NYU Game Center - High School Programs
